item.title: How to rebuild my hugo file
item.description: 1) Delete ‘public’ folder Link to heading if ‘Already exists in the index~’ error occured, should delete caches in your directory. open git bash! git rm --cached [my hugo project folder] 2) Open ‘git bash’ Link to heading Link to heading 3) Go to my hugo project folder Link to heading use “cd” command Link to heading 4) link with my repository Link to heading git init git remote add origin <my github repository(for build) url> 5) my github.
